about_the_game:
Expand your Rocket League® customization options with the "Chaos Run" DLC Pack! This add-on includes…

* 2 new Battle-Cars, Ripper and Grog
* 6 unique Decals for each new Battle-Car (12 Total)
* 2 new Paint Types
* 2 new Wheels
* 2 new Rocket Boosts
* 3 new Toppers
* 3 new Antennas
detailed_description:
Expand your Rocket League® customization options with the "Chaos Run" DLC Pack! This add-on includes…

* 2 new Battle-Cars, Ripper and Grog
* 6 unique Decals for each new Battle-Car (12 Total)
* 2 new Paint Types
* 2 new Wheels
* 2 new Rocket Boosts
* 3 new Toppers
* 3 new Antennas

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 or ATI 2900
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 260 series or ATI 5850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
